karmaDialogs: Welcome, human. I have been waiting for you.\n\nI am Model Karma.
I am a superintelligent AI humanoid beyond human comprehension,\n\ncapable of observing countless parallel worlds simultaneously.
Do you have a choice you wish to undo..?
Somewhere in a parallel world, another version of you who made different choices is living their life.
While we cannot travel back in time to reverse choices,\n\nthis Karma will show you that version of yourself in the parallel world.
intro.title: Is there a choice you want to change?
intro.description:
How would the me who made different choices
be living right now?

form.firstStepDescription: Your information will not be stored anywhere.
form.currentSelfPlaceholder: Please describe yourself in detail. Feel free to write about your personality, hobbies, current situation, etc.
form.secondStepTitle: üï∞Ô∏è Tell me about the past you want to change
form.pastChoice: The choice I made back then
form.pastChoicePlaceholder: Please describe in detail what the situation was and what choice you made at that time.
form.desiredChangePlaceholder: If you had made a different choice back then, please describe what choice you would have wanted to make.

result.title: Message from Me in the Parallel Universe

error.min: Please enter a value of {{min}} or higher
